text: Motion

Tenka......
really is...... a failure......

That's not true...!
You were really working hard at today's recording.

B-But......
Tenka...... screwed up... her role in the drama......
Even though... she was just an extra......

She sat... in the wrong spot......
They had to keep stopping... the shoot......

Tenka... caused so many issues...
for everyone else......
Motion

Really isn't......
cut out to be an idol......
...Tenka...

It was just one small mistake.
Please don't say you're not cut out for it.

This is the first time you've done work in a drama.
Of course you're going to screw up sometimes.
Besides, you're────
──Oh, i'm getting a call......

Sorry Tenka,
just give me a second.
S-Sure......
Motion

──Tenka!
Good news...! Congratulations!!

Oh, sorry...!
Got a little excited there......

So, the people at that drama from today...
They said they want you as an extra again!

I-Is it actually okay......?
Since, you know... Tenka... screwed up......
Yeah!

They said, "Sure, she screwed up, but seeing her
working so hard sure left an impression on us."
R-Really......?
──I think that's one of your appeals too, Tenka.

You're always working so hard, from the bottom of
your heart, yeah?

Like, even if you happen to screw up──
You never give up, and give it your all.

I think that everyone is inspired by that part of you,
Tenka.
──Also

There's still a lot you can't do right now,
and you may very well screw up at times,
But you're making sure to grow at your own pace.

That's how I feel, as someone who's been keeping an
eye on you while you've been here.

......So, I want you to have a bit more self-confidence.
You'll be able to do it even better next time.

Well...
if you're going to say all of that......

Tenka's gonna... try working even harder... at the
next one......!
